note:
I'm an L.A.-living but Colorado-pining graphic and media designer with a B.S. in filmmaking and B.L. (bachelor of life) in acting and writing and lots else creative. He/Him.

Social media behavior: I will rant about stuff that seems trivial. I will curse. I will be random. I will vanish for swaths of time. My brand managers find all this impossible and tiring to deal with.
